title: Implementation of the Recommendations of Lessons Learnt and Reconciliation Commission (LLRC)
decision_details:
on the basis of a presentation made to the Cabinet of Ministers by the Secretary to the President, Cabinet observed that satisfactory progress has been made in the implementation of recommendations of the Lessons Learnt and Reconciliation Commission (LLRC).
It was also noted that twenty two (22) Ministries and Institutions directly involved in this process have action plans to meet the deadline stipulated.
